article:
Formatting specifications for UBL Order instances
2004OASIS $Date: 2005-05-27 22:23:36 $(UTC)
Purchase order formatting specifications
Three sample formatting specifications are offered for this document type:
Office-oriented order form
Joinery-oriented order form
United Nations Layout Key form 220: Order
For a list of all formatting specifications and an overview of the documentation conventions, please visit the formatting specification home page.
&FS-status;
